title: How the hell do you outtrade Lucian and who do I pick against him?
body:
So this guy told me he's easy to outtrade (applies to every champion).

Because Q is easy to dodge and you can go back so his passive goes off then you can harass.

Okay, so basically he's saying you're going to get zoned from his passive and that Q, which has a 0.35 delay once casted, is super easy to dodge EVEN on champions without any dodge abilities besides flash.

I don't believe this because from my experience if you get just a bit too close all he's going to do is E up to you, then use a spell, and boom, you get outtraded because he has 4 shots and you probably only have 2, or none, if you get scared and try to flee.

I'm not even going to go in depth about this guy because I don't care enough, now my question, how the hell do you outtrade Lucian and who's the best pick against him? Because I'm sick of seeing everybody and their mother picking this champion that's ridiculously strong and I'd love to know what to do against him.
